# autoglue_ssh_key (Resource)

Manages an Autoglue SSH keypair (public metadata only).



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) Human-readable SSH key name.

### Optional

- `bits` (Number) Key size in bits (RSA only; typically 2048, 3072, or 4096). Ignored for ED25519.
- `comment` (String) Optional key comment (e.g. deploy@autoglue).
- `type` (String) "rsa" (default) or "ed25519".

### Read-Only

- `created_at` (String) Creation timestamp.
- `fingerprint` (String) SSH key fingerprint.
- `id` (String) Unique SSH key ID.
- `organization_id` (String) Owning organization UUID.
- `public_key` (String) OpenSSH-formatted public key.
- `updated_at` (String) Last update timestamp.
